description: Please download the latest version on our Inateck official website to enhance your using experience.This product has been designed specifically forusers of ultrabooks, notebook, laptop PC and tablets with USB Port; offer a practical and comfortable expansion of three USB3.0 ports and one RJ45 Gigabit ethernet connection; Since the length of the USB cable is approximately30cm, you are kindly advised to order a USB 3.0 extension cable along with this product If you intend to connect it to a desktop PC.Product FeaturesUSB 3.0 male A to RJ45 10/100/1000 Gigabit ethernet adapter with 3- Port USB 3.0 HubThe ideal companion for notebooks, Ultrabooks and tablet PCs with USB portsTransfer speed USB3.0: theoretical 5Gbps, real 100-150 MBps; RJ45: 10/100/1000 MbpsBuilt-in Overvoltage/ Overcurrent/ Leakage and Short-Circuit protection unitMain Chipsets:VL812 (VIA) and AX88179Supported Operating Systems:Windows XP/Vista/7/8 (32/64 bit), MacOS-X, LinuxFor users running Windows 8.1 or some particular Mac OS versions, we recommend downloading the latest driver batch from our Inateck website or contacting our customer support regarding this issue.Gigabit EthernetSupports up to 1000Mbps and downwards compatible with 10/100MbpsSupport IEEE 802.3az (Energy Efficient Ethernet). Compatible with IEEE 802.3, IEEE 802.3u, IEEE 802.3abPower Usage AlertsFor stable operation, devices connected to this hub should not exceed a combined current of 5V 900mAh. Do not connect it to more than one high power-consuming device, such as HDDs, certain office equipment, etc.This hub is not meant to serve as a stand-alone charger. It is not compatible with iPads or any other devices with irregular charging requirements
title: [3*USB 3.0 + 1*Gigabit Ethernet Adapter] Inateck 3 Ports USB 3.0 Bus-Powered Hub with RJ45 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet Converter LAN Wired Network Adapter for Laptops, Ultrabooks and Tablet PCs with USB Ports, Compatible with Windows XP/7/8, Mac OS-X, Linux
